data.description:
The Mixed Reality platform for Design Review, Sales Presentations and Group Training. Leveraging secure cloud servers, JoinXR upgrades the display capabilities of your headset by 1000x. This streamlines the display of complex 3D, CAD and point cloud data, allowing you to rapidly author and share your own 3D presentations.

- Collaborate with colleagues and clients from around the world in immersive meetings. Lifelike avatars from a single selfie make you feel as if you are in the same room.

- Use simple workflows to create your own presentations, mixing documents, images and video alongside 3D Models, CAD and Point Cloud Data

- Engage stakeholders, Collaborate across disciplines, Review designs in 3D and Accelerate training by rapidly sharing knowledge

- JoinXR is iso27001 accredited, meaning your data is secure from day one.

NOTE : To use JoinXR you will need to have a trial account created for your organisation, please register an account here 

https://join.fracturereality.io/

and contact 

join@fracturereality.io

changelog.change_log: Adding support for Meta Quest Visual Positioning System to allow JoinXR meetings in Mixed Reality with far superior shared alignment
Fix for performance regression in previous version

- Video Playback
- Laser pointer
- Improved avatar hands

New
Improved device security and added an opt-in pin-entry option when selecting your user account in headset
Improved lighting of 3D objects
Number of small UX improvements when navigating the menu systems in headset

Fixed
A number of small issues with passthrough rendering when switching between documents and modes
Fixed visibility of mute icon on other users' avatars
Fix for selection menu left floating in space when repositioning the meeting in passthrough mode
